name: Split Souls (Napalm1432)
description:
Split Souls

This is our entry for the 8Bit Game Jam.
Split Souls is about your body and soul being split, you can switch between your soul and body to solve puzzles, avoid enemies and collecting soul shards.
When you solve all the levels / collect enough soul shards your body will merge back with your soul!
Controllers are also supported, when using an xbox controller, X and X are mapped to A and X on the controller, besides that it should be self explanatory.

I hope you enjoy our game, all assets are also downloadable for anyone who wants to learn from it.
